name: Colour Block
description:
Hello, World!

This is my very first game made in 30 minutes! It was made for a 30-minute game creation challenge I recently started. The games made during this challenge are supposed to be very simple and lack many features, so don't be surprised. I still hope you enjoy this mini-game!

Instructions:

1: switch colour to orange

2: switch colour to yellow

3: switch colour to blue

4: switch colour to pink

Goal:

Don't let a circle touch you that isn't the same colour as you!
